dt: {bc}an act or process of {a_link|clearing}: such as
{bc}the removal of buildings from an area (such as a city slum)
{bc}the act of clearing a ship at the customhouse
{bc}the papers showing that a ship has {a_link|cleared}
{bc}the offsetting of checks and other claims among banks through a {a_link|clearinghouse}
{bc}authorization for an aircraft to proceed especially with a specified action
{bc}the distance by which one object {a_link|clears} another or the clear space between them
{bc}the volume of blood or plasma that can be freed of a specified constituent in a specified time by its excretion into the urine through the kidneys

dt.t: a creatine {wi}clearance{/wi} of 25 milliliters per minute

shortdef: an act or process of clearing: such as
the removal of buildings from an area (such as a city slum)
the act of clearing a ship at the customhouse; also : the papers showing that a ship has cleared
